item.title: Information Gathering
item.description: Recon There are two type of Reconnaissance Passive Reconnaissance :– Doing the recon without coming in direct contact of the target. \ Active Reconnaissance :– Doing the active notecible action on the target site. Passive Reconnaissance includes local/Geo Information Satellite Images Building layout Cabin location, fence, count of head in building, ways to exit, break areas, security fencing. Job information Senior manager name, meeting routine, job title. Image from social sites like badge photo, cubical, desktop.

item.title: Learn Tmux
item.description: #tmux #linux #tool bullet point install what it is what it can do tmux key binding tmux conf extra features patching for history backups Linux : sudo apt-get install tmux Fedora : sudo dnf -y install tmux Cent-OS : sudo yum -y install tmux Arch Linux : sudo pacman -S tmux to start : tmux NOTE: Prefix key : Ctrl+b github What is tmux ?? It is terminal multiplexer. It acts as a window manager in your terminal.
